# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width)
    lines = Vector{String}()
    current_line = String[]
    for word in split(text)
        if length(join(current_line)) + length(word) <= text_width
            push!(current_line, word)
        else
            push!(lines, join(current_line))
            current_line = [word]
        end
    end
    push!(lines, join(current_line))
    return lines
end
```

例子：
```julia
wrap_string("Hello world. This is a very long sentence that needs to be wrapped. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.", 20)
```
输出：
```text
["Hello world.", "This is a ve", "ry long sen", "tence that ne", "eds to be wr", "apped. The qu", "ick brown fo", "x jumps over the lazy dog."]
```
